author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Comtech Says Won $134.0 Million Contract To Provide 911 Public Safety & Security Technologies To U.S. Wireless Carrier
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Comtech Telecommunications Corp:
* COMTECH WINS STRATEGIC $134.0 MILLION CONTRACT TO PROVIDE 911 PUBLIC SAFETY AND SECURITY TECHNOLOGIES TO A U.S. WIRELESS CARRIER
* COMTECH - CONTRACT HAS INITIAL EXPIRATION DATE DURING CO‘S Q1 OF FISCAL 2023 AND WILL AUTOMATICALLY RENEW UNDER SOME CONDITIONS
* COMTECH TELECOMMUNICATIONS - CONTRACT WAS EFFECTIVE IMMEDIATELY, HAS INITIAL EXPIRATION DATE DURING CO‘S Q1 FISCAL 2023
* COMTECH TELECOMMUNICATIONS - CONTRACT WILL AUTOMATICALLY RENEW, UNDER CERTAIN CONDITIONS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
